__e: If you ever stop breathing with the guy upstairs I'll be here waiting for you.
Michael, if you're worried about Rachel leaving you, if you stop doing what you're doing, I don't think she will.
Listen... perhaps it would be best if you stopped speaking.
I'll come back when you stop spinning me a line.
- If I could change one thing about you... It would be for you to stop trying to change me.
I have a boyfriend that I love, so I need you to stop pursuing me.
But, you know, if you stop worrying about forever, there's plenty of shit that can get you through the next hour.

Yes, Louis, because I work for you now, and I'd like to tell you to stop questioning whether I'm gonna change my mind, but we both know that's never gonna happen, so instead, I'll say... you need to talk to me about it when it does.
I may pay for your life here, but if you continue to see your brother, it will cost you, and this is what you will lose.
